text: Ezɨ Atrivim Sedekaia akar dɨkɨrɨzir mam Jeremaia bagha a gamigha ghaze, “Bar guizbangɨra, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn bar pɨn itim, a Godɨn ikɨrɨmɨrir angamɨra itim isa gumazamizibagh anɨdim, kɨ an ziamɨn nɨ mɨgei, kɨ nɨ mɨsueghtɨ nɨ aremeghan kogham. Egh kɨ nɨ isɨ gumazir nɨ gasɨghasɨghamibar dafarim datɨghan kogham. Bar puvatɨgham.”
